topic.title: Labor and Delivery Procedure Section - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.7"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:382)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:381)/@code="29300-1" Procedure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:518)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:383)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:384)
Obstetric procedure information is collected for a live birth certificate, but not for a fetal death report. One or more entries recording the presence of an obstetric procedure may be recorded. Each entry contains information for a single procedure. In addition, an observation is provided (for live births only) if none of the indicated procedures were performed.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Obstetric Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.39)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:385)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Method of Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.45)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:382)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:381)/@code="29300-1" Procedure (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:518)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:383)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:384)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Obstetric Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.39)
Obstetric procedure information is collected for a live birth certificate, but not for a fetal death report. One or more entries recording the presence of an obstetric procedure may be recorded. Each entry contains information for a single procedure. In addition, an observation is provided (for live births only) if none of the indicated procedures were performed.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:385)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Method of Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.45)
